name: Piatto comune di Qingce
desc: Yaoyao's specialty. It looks rather mundane as it is not displayed with the same luxurious aesthetic as dishes prepared by a fancy restaurant. However, as soon as you take a bite, the flavor immediately offers you a fragrant and intimate experience, certain to leave an ever-lasting impression. After a single taste, what's on your tongue will be on your heart for good. As for the reason, maybe the secret ingredient to this recipe is simply "caring."

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 274 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Ricetta: soffritto alla Qingce
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Qingce Stir Fry.

customize.name: Fungo
customize.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

customize.name: Frutto di loto
customize.desc: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

customize.name: Peperoncino di Jueyun
customize.desc: Un pianta piccante nativa di Liyue. Basta annusarlo per provare caldo e sete.

customize.name: Cavolo
customize.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

customize.name: Soffritto alla Qingce
customize.desc: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. They say it was originally just a rustic dish that everyone in Qingce Village knew how to make. But quite unexpectedly, its crispy and spicy dishes gained the recognition of people from elsewhere, and thus began to spread throughout the Liyue region.

customize.name: Yaoyao
customize.desc: La pi√π giovane discepola di Raminga dei sentieri. Una "piccola adulta" gentile e premurosa.
